--     STATUS      mandatory
--     DESCRIPTION 
--         "Something that is the address of a host."
--     SYNTAX      OCTET STRING (SIZE(0..127))

--     STATUS      mandatory

--     STATUS      mandatory

i2ObjectField OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { icinga2 1 }

i2Field OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { i2ObjectField 0 }

i2ObjectType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      INTEGER { host(1), service(2), hostgroup(3), 
                    servicegroup(4), hostescalation(5), 
                    serviceescalation(6), hostdependency(7), 
                    servicedependency(8), timeperiod(9), contact(10), 
                    contactgroup(11), command(12), endpoint(13), 
                    zone(14) }
    ACCESS      read-write
    STATUS      mandatory
    DESCRIPTION 
        "Objecttype, id mapping type"
    ::= { i2Field 1 }

i2DisplayName OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      I2String
    ACCESS      read-write
    STATUS      mandatory
    DESCRIPTION 
        "Display name"
    ::= { i2Field 2 }

i2StateType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      INTEGER { stateTypeSoft(0), stateTypeHard(1) }
    ACCESS      read-write
    STATUS      mandatory
    DESCRIPTION 
        "State type, could be soft or hard."
    ::= { i2Field 3 }

i2HostField OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { i2ObjectField 1 }

i2HostName OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      I2HostName
    ACCESS      read-write
    STATUS      mandatory
    DESCRIPTION 
        "Hostname"
    ::= { i2HostField 1 }

i2StateHost OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      INTEGER { hostUp(0), hostDown(1) }
    ACCESS      read-only
    STATUS      mandatory
    DESCRIPTION 
        "Host state"
    ::= { i2HostField 4 }

i2ServiceField OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { i2ObjectField 2 }

i2StateService OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      INTEGER { serviceOK(0), serviceWarning(1), 
                    serviceCritical(2), serviceUnknown(3) }
    ACCESS      read-write
    STATUS      mandatory
    DESCRIPTION 
        "Service state"
    ::= { i2ServiceField 2 }

i2NotificationType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      INTEGER { downtimeStart(0), downtimeEnd(1), 
                    downtimeRemoved(2), custom(3), acknowledgement(4), 
                    problem(5), recovery(6), flappingStart(7), 
                    flappingEnd(8) }
    ACCESS      not-accessible
    STATUS      mandatory
    DESCRIPTION 
        "Notfication type"
    ::= { i2ObjectField 6 }

i2ContactField OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { i2ObjectField 10 }

icinga2Type OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { icinga2 2 }

icinga2Notifications OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { icinga2 3 }

icinga2Traps OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { icinga2 4 }

icinga2Groups OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { icinga2 5 }

icinga2Conformance OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { icinga2 6 }

icinga2Compliance OBJECT IDENTIFIER
    ::= { icinga2 7 }

    ENTERPRISE  icinga2Notifications

    DESCRIPTION 
        "Host trap"
    ::= 1

    DESCRIPTION 
        "Service trap"
    ::= 2
